abstract: We love MarkLogic and all the things you can do with it, but sometimes we just want to get a bit of data one-off into a tool we also love – Excel.  This talk will describe some easy ways to get data from MarkLogic into Excel for those times you want to make a quick calculation, a complicated graph or to email your co-workers some data.  We will discuss several methods. Some of them may surprise you as to how easy they are.
title: Getting data from MarkLogic into Excel
